title: His Sacrifice
description: Twelve years ago I became a man.I made a lifelong promise to my family, I learned how to kill, and I kissed the girl I loved goodbye.Leaving Evelyn behind destroyed any good in me, and turned me into the ruthless monster my Father needed his heir to be.I thought I was dead inside, that nothing could weaken me. That was until fate brought us back together. How can I sacrifice her again?*His Sacrifice is a standalone, mafia, dark romance for adult readers.*
author: Emma Creed
